meanings.definition: A book containing a collection of songs.
meanings.sent1: I found my old songbook under the bed.
meanings.sent2: She flipped through the songbook to find her favorite tune.
meanings.sent3: The songbook seemed to hum with melodies when opened.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a songbook of emotions, each note telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The worn pages of the songbook held memories of music and joy.

meanings.sent1: The songbook of the band included both old and new hits.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a songbook of classic rock songs.
meanings.sent3: The songbook overflowed with tunes, almost bursting at the seams.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a songbook of bird melodies, each species adding a unique note.
meanings.sent5: The songbook of nature played on, the wind carrying its sweet melodies.
